overview:
Creative Technologist and Canadian (Dutch/Irish/English/Metis) Expatriate based in UK and Netherlands. Winner 2010 Deloitte Tech., Media & Telcom (TMT) Predictions for Entrepreneurs in Holland for futurist views on Media Convergence (Tech Visionary). 2011 Computerworld Honors Laureate for Innovation - visionary application to promote positive social, economic and educational change.
